markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Munagola (Executioner Devil)](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1115)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Munagolas are some of the most feared demonic warriors in Hell, combining the aerial strength and craftiness of erinyes with sheer brute force rivaling that of the strongest devils.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 28

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Devil_Munagola.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Munagola](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1115)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Devil" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=44" />
<trait label="Fiend" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=70" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 66</row>

**Perception** +24; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Celestial](/Languages.aspx?ID=16), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 100 feet

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +23, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +22, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +21, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +18, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +21

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +6

**Con** +6

**Int** +3

**Wis** +5

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [breastplate](/Armor.aspx?ID=10)_, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74)_, _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [greataxe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=21)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 31 

**Fort** +23 

**Ref** +21 

**Will** +20 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic
</row>

**HP** 165

**Immunities**
fire

**Resistances**
physical 10 (except [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379))

**Weaknesses**
good 10

**No Escape** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A foe within reach moves away from the munagola; **Effects** The munagola Strides or Flies up to their Speed, following the retreating foe and keeping it in reach until the foe stops moving or the munagola has moved their full Speed.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, fly 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_flaming greataxe_ +24 ([Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194)),
**Damage** 2d12+13 slashing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 fire

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
horn +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 2d8+13 piercing plus 1d6 evil

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_flaming composite longbow_ +23 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 2d8+6 piercing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 fire

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 27
- **4th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69) (at will)
- **5th**
[Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69)

**Rituals** DC 27

- **1st**
[Infernal Pact](/Rituals.aspx?ID=23)

**Felling Assault**   When a munagola hits with a melee Strike, they gain [Improved Knockdown](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=28) on all subsequent melee Strikes against that target until the end of the munagola's turn.

**Flames of Fury**   Any weapon a munagola holds gains the effects of a [_flaming_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=295) rune while they hold it.

**Flight Commander of Dis** <actions string="Single Action" />  The munagola directs aerial maneuvers, granting themself and evil allies with fly Speeds a +20-foot status bonus to their fly Speeds for 1 round.

**Sudden Dive** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The munagola Flies twice. If they end their flight at a lower elevation than they started and within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against that enemy, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to the Strike.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Defying Limiation</title>

While Dis is a city of unyielding order and unforgiving law, the Queen of the Night [Eiseth](/Deities.aspx?ID=169) operates outside of the established diabolical hierarchy. Despite her stronghold being located within the Infernal City, her army of [erinyes](/Monsters.aspx?ID=111), commanded by the fierce and brutal munagolas, answer only to her. They strike her enemies without mercy or restraint, even in open defiance of [Dispater](/Deities.aspx?ID=66) if it suits their queen.

</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-30" />
name: Munagola

Recall Knowledge - Fiend (Religion): DC 28 Unspecific Lore : DC 26 Specific Lore : DC 23 Munagola Source Bestiary 3 pg. 66 Perception +24; greater darkvision Languages Celestial, Common, Draconic, Infernal; telepathy 100 feet Skills Acrobatics +23, Athletics +22, Intimidation +21, Religion +18, Stealth +21 Str +7 Dex +6 Con +6 Int +3 Wis +5 Cha +6 Items +1 breastplate , +1 striking composite longbow , +1 striking greataxe --- AC 31 Fort +23 Ref +21 Will +20 +1 status to all saves vs. magic HP 165 Immunities fire Resistances physical 10 (except silver) Weaknesses good 10 No Escape Reaction Trigger A foe within reach moves away from the munagola; Effects The munagola Strides or Flies up to their Speed, following the retreating foe and keeping it in reach until the foe stops moving or the munagola has moved their full Speed. --- Speed 30 feet, fly 40 feet Melee Single Action flaming greataxe +24 (Evil, Fire, Magical, Sweep), Damage 2d12+13 slashing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 fire Melee Single Action horn +23 (Agile, Evil, Magical), Damage 2d8+13 piercing plus 1d6 evil Ranged Single Action flaming composite longbow +23 (deadly d10, Evil, Fire, Magical, range increment 100 feet, reload 0, volley 30 feet), Damage 2d8+6 piercing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 fire Divine Innate Spells DC 27 - 4th Dimension Door (at will) - 5th Dimension Door Rituals DC 27 - 1st Infernal Pact Felling Assault When a munagola hits with a melee Strike, they gain Improved Knockdown on all subsequent melee Strikes against that target until the end of the munagola's turn. Flames of Fury Any weapon a munagola holds gains the effects of a flaming rune while they hold it. Flight Commander of Dis Single Action The munagola directs aerial maneuvers, granting themself and evil allies with fly Speeds a +20-foot status bonus to their fly Speeds for 1 round. Sudden Dive Two Actions The munagola Flies twice. If they end their flight at a lower elevation than they started and within melee reach of at least one enemy, they can make a melee Strike against that enemy, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to the Strike. Defying Limiation While Dis is a city of unyielding order and unforgiving law, the Queen of the Night Eiseth operates outside of the established diabolical hierarchy. Despite her stronghold being located within the Infernal City, her army of erinyes, commanded by the fierce and brutal munagolas, answer only to her. They strike her enemies without mercy or restraint, even in open defiance of Dispater if it suits their queen.
